tool_description: Get stock information using a simple and free REST API.

api_list.name: Get the stock history by exchange code and stock code
api_list.description: Retrieve the historical stock data based on the specified exchange code and stock code.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve stock history.

required_parameters.name: exchangeCode
required_parameters.description: The code of the stock exchange (e.g., NASDAQ).

required_parameters.name: stockCode
required_parameters.description: The code of the stock (e.g., GOOG).

api_list.name: Get the current stock by exchange code and stock code
api_list.description: Retrieve the current stock data based on the specified exchange code and stock code.

required_parameters.name: stockCode
required_parameters.description: The code of the stock (e.g., GOOG).

required_parameters.name: exchangeCode
required_parameters.description: The code of the stock exchange (e.g., NASDAQ).

api_list.name: Get the stock history by code
api_list.description: Retrieve the historical stock data based on the specified stock code.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve stock history.

required_parameters.name: stockCode
required_parameters.description: The code of the stock (e.g., GOOG).

api_list.name: Get the current stock by code
api_list.description: Retrieve the current stock data based on the specified stock code.

required_parameters.name: stockCode
required_parameters.description: The code of the stock (e.g., GOOG).
